summary: Concord was a video game that came out in 2024. It was a shooter game where players fought as teams of mercenaries in a sci-fi world with humans and aliens. The game was made by Firewalk Studios and cost a lot of money to make, but it did not sell well. Critics gave it mixed reviews, and it was shut down soon after it came out, with players getting refunds.
title: Concord (video game)
